title: Beyond the last blue mountain: A life of J.R.D. Tata
description: This is the biography of J.R.D. Tata, the patriarch of the biggest industrial house in India, comparable in stature to Forbes, Rockefeller or Du Pont. He pioneered aviation in India, and presided over the development of the country's steel, cement, truck and vegetable oils industry.
author: R.M. Lala
